backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing product, contact submission, and document storage with query and update APIs using maps and blob storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for all frontend source files and assets.
Markdown guide explaining how to configure the custom domain pccomputerandcommunication.com for the IC app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light and dark theme color variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up the root element, canonical domain link, and loading the main React script.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: Domain verification file listing pccomputerandcommunication.com for IC boundary nodes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component composing all sections of the site with theme and query providers.
frontend/src/catalog/staticProducts.ts: Static product catalog with metadata and image URLs plus helper lookup function.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section displaying company intro, storefront image, and core values.
frontend/src/components/CancellationRefu: Component rendering the site's cancellation and refund policy section.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Implements a contact section with a form that submits user messages via a mutation and displays contact details. Includes validation, toast notifications, and UI cards.
frontend/src/components/Documents.tsx: Fetches and displays downloadable documents using cards, with loading skeletons and formatted upload dates. Provides view and download actions for each document.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, quick navigation links, contact info, and social icons. Includes smooth scroll handling for section navigation.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a sticky header with navigation links, scroll-based styling, mobile sheet menu, and support for deep-link hash navigation. Allows smooth scrolling to page sections.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero banner with headline, CTAs, and feature highlights. Supports smooth scrolling to products and contact sections.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Displays available products grouped by category, fetching data via react-query and showing images, prices, and details.
frontend/src/components/Terms.tsx: Renders the site's Terms & Conditions page with sections for overview, pricing, orders, returns, and warranty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, invalidating related queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identity restoration, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating documents, contact submissions, and products using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark mode, including color tokens and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
